casebody.data:
No. 629,

October Term, 1960.

Commissioner of Internal Revenue v. Schlude et ux.,

367 U. S. 911. Petition for rehearing denied. The per curiam order heretofore entered herein is amended to read as follows: “Per Curiam: The petition for writ of certiorari is granted. The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded for further consideration in the light of American Automobile Association v. United States, ante, p. 687.

Mr. Justice Douglas dissents.”
